text: hi and welcome to crash course u.s history a course that approximately follows the ap u.s history curriculum as it appeared in 2013
and even though we call it u.s history we do begin before any europeans show up in north america from the 15th century we'll take you
through every beat of the country's history until we reach barack obama's presidency this will include all the well-known events we'll learn about
the revolutionary war the civil war women's suffrage the world wars civil rights and so on but we'll introduce you to some
lesser-known events and people as well we'll do that via primary sources that do a deep dive into how people were reacting to the
time period they were living through we'll also consider who was given the privilege to have their reactions recorded
because when citizens are marginalized based on class gender or race that history isn't just history it touches every part of the present so
we'll learn it all together and try to make sense of the united states complicated history oh and if jon gets the mystery document
wrong he'll be shocked literally [Music] you
